description: Test suite for the Mistral agent tools integration, including synchronous and asynchronous tests, structured output validation, and multiple tool call scenarios.

classes.name: StockPrice
classes.description: Pydantic model representing stock price with fields for price and currency.

methods.name: test_tool_use
methods.description: Tests basic tool usage with the YFinanceTools to fetch stock price.

methods.name: test_tool_use_stream
methods.description: Tests streaming response and detection of tool call events.

methods.name: test_tool_use_with_native_structured_outputs
methods.description: Tests structured output with a custom Pydantic model.

methods.name: test_async_tool_use_stream
methods.description: Asynchronous streaming test for tool call detection.

methods.name: test_parallel_tool_calls
methods.description: Tests multiple tool calls in a single response.

methods.name: test_multiple_tool_calls
methods.description: Tests multiple different tools invoked in a single run.

methods.name: test_tool_call_custom_tool_no_parameters
methods.description: Test with a custom tool function without parameters (skipped).

methods.name: test_tool_call_custom_tool_optional_parameters
methods.description: Test with a custom tool function with optional parameters (skipped).

methods.name: test_tool_call_custom_tool_untyped_parameters
methods.description: Test with a custom tool function with untyped parameters.

methods.name: test_tool_call_list_parameters
methods.description: Test for tools handling list of URLs and extracting paper info.
